title: Wondering where your C: drive space is going? Check your Baldur's Gate 3 save folder

title: Somehow Sword Dancer pulled off combining a JRPG and a fighting game on a Japanese PC built for visual novels

title: ULTRARAM may be a silly name but it's the holy grail for memory tech and means your PC could hibernate for over 1,000 years
